alert.note: Alert for Copiah; Jefferson; Lincoln (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 15 at 11:29AM CDT until June 15 at 12:30PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Lincoln County in south central Mississippi... East central Jefferson County in southwestern Mississippi... Southwestern Copiah County in central Mississippi... * Until 1230 PM CDT. * At 1129 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Mcbride, or 18 miles east of Fayette, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Allen and Barlow around 1135 AM CDT. Caseyville around 1140 AM CDT. Loyd Star around 1150 AM CDT. Vaughn around 1155 AM CDT. Brookhaven, Wesson and Beauregard around 1200 PM CDT. East Lincoln around 1220 PM CDT. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
